t7jGBSaBmTc#5#PL_oohi_O51Z_lORk8SCG_4x1s: it's no secret that the past few years have been very difficult for many small firms they taste week sales diminished asset values elevated uncertainty and tight credit market conditions many small business owners have had to lay off employees or defer hiring and many potential entrepreneurs with plans to start new businesses have had to put those plans on hold

the role of small businesses and Entrepreneurship and job creation will be discussed in our first panel today as many of you are aware small businesses have played an important role in fueling past economic recovery we need to think carefully about how in the current economic environment our nation can best provide small businesses and entrepreneurs with the support they need to expand job opportunities
small businesses also helped our country to be globally they often offer a level of agility in bringing Innovative products to the global Marketplace at larger firms cannot match
